email_template.subject: Bill.com Statement - {account_group} - {from_date} to {to_date}
email_template.body:
Dear {account_group} Team,

Please find attached your Bill.com accounts payable statement covering {from_date} to {to_date}.

See https://s.apache.org/review_bill_statements for reviewing guidance.

If you have any questions please contact the Treasury team at treasurer@apache.org.

Best regards,
Apache Software Foundation Treasury
email_template.no_activity_body:
Dear {account_group} Team,

This is to confirm that no Bill.com activity occurred for your account group during the period {from_date} to {to_date}.

If you have any questions, please contact the Treasury team at treasurer@apache.org.

Best regards,
Apache Software Foundation Treasury
